ApplicationFees: The application fee for domestic applicants is $40 and for international applicants is $40.
AdditionalInformation: Certain graduate programs and selective undergraduate programs at Northern Kentucky University require additional information beyond the standard application.
AdditionalDeadlines: Based on a thorough review of the Northern Kentucky University website, nku.edu, there are no explicitly stated additional deadlines for scholarships, financial aid, or other academic matters apart from general application deadlines.
IsMultipleApplicationsAllowed: After a thorough investigation of the provided Northern Kentucky University website (nku.edu) and the specific international admission requirements page, no explicit policy was found regarding the submission of applications to more than one program for the same intake term. The searches for keywords such as 'multiple applications', 'concurrent applications', and 'more than one program' did not yield any specific regulations on this matter.
IsAnalyticalNotRequired: Null. The official university website for Northern Kentucky University, nku.edu, does not explicitly state that analytical writing is not required. There is also no explicit statement that analytical writing is a requirement. Searches for "analytical writing" within the university's course catalog, general education requirements, and admission guidelines do not yield a direct statement on this specific type of writing not being a requirement.
IsGMATRequired: Null. I was unable to find any explicit information on the Northern Kentucky University website (nku.edu) that states whether the GMAT is a requirement for the university.
IsLSATRequired: False. The Northern Kentucky University Chase College of Law website states that applicants must take either the Law School Admission Test (LSAT) or the Graduate Record Examinations (GRE). If an applicant takes both the LSAT and the GRE, they are required to report their LSAT score.
UGScholarshipHigh: Haile Foundation Undergraduate Full Tuition Scholarship
